description: You are in the southern end of a grand hall in the Grand Hotel.  Gilded statues and crystal chandeliers decorate the room overhead while ornate oak furniture serves as supports for vases full of freshly-cut flowers.  The foyer continues to the north.

exits.description: In the east, you see an alcove with a sign which reads: 'Donations'
The hall continues to the north.

title: The Foyer of the Grand Hotel

description: You are in the central section of a grand hall in the Grand Hotel.  The magnificent decorations remind you of the enormous wealth required to build such an immense structure, even in this age.  The ceiling is nearly invisible far above.  The soft carpet gently sinks with each of your steps.  A very wide set of doors leads west.

exits.description: The hall continues to the south.
The hall continues to the north.

title: The Foyer of the Grand Hotel

description: You are in the central section of a grand hall in the Grand Hotel.  Plush carpet muffles all sound around you and the warm glow of soft lights prevents any shadows from forming.  Gold and crystal reflect tiny specks of light in all directions.  An official-looking room stands to the west and the hall continues north and south.

exits.description: The hall continues to the south.
The hall continues to the north.
The Post Office is to the west.

title: The Foyer of the Grand Hotel

description: You are in the central section of a grand hall in the Grand Hotel.  Gold and crystal reflect the light onto the soft floor.  Amazing rugs cover the floor, while spectacular paintings decorate the walls.  Loud noise emanates from a doorway to the east.

exits.description: The hall continues to the south.
The hall continues to the north.

title: The Foyer of the Grand Hotel

description: You are in the central section of a grand hall in the Grand Hotel.  A huge table sits in the center of the room, covered by flowers.  Soft music plays in the background.  The carpet shows many footprints here leading to the west, which appears to be a shopping area.  Wall-mounted lights lead to the north.

exits.description: The hall continues to the north.
The hall continues to the south.

title: The Foyer of the Grand Hotel

description: The brightly-lit foyer gives way to a more private, more intimate darkness here.  A bank of elevators lines the wall, granting access to guests to floors above and below the central foyer.  The hotel seems quiet here except for the occasional chime as the doors open.

exits.description: The hall continues to the south.

title: The Elevators of the Grand Hotel

description: As you enter the restaurant of the hotel, a spectacular dining room appears before your eyes.  Small tables sit scattered throughout the room, arranged in a manner to give a sense of privacy.  Atop each table, covered by a white linen, rests a candle, some silverware, and a few accessories.  The restaurant continues south and west.

exits.description: The busy foyer is back east.
The restaurant continues to the south.
The restaurant continues to the west.

title: The Hotel Restaurant

description: The dark restaurant's ambiance is enhanced by the flickering candlelight from each table.  The sound of smooth jazz drifts through the air, creating a welcoming, almost seductive, environment.  The heavenly smell of food wafts throughout, changing as staff serves each dish.  The restaurant continues to the east and south.

exits.description: The restaurant continues to the east.
The restaurant continues to the south.

title: The Hotel Restaurant

description: A faint murmur of conversation is barely audible over the entrancing music here.  The low ceiling and long distance between the tables prevents the feeling of crowding.  The design seems to want to bring patrons into a dining experience rather than simply for a meal.  The restaurant continues north and east here.

exits.description: The restaurant continues to the north.
The restaurant continues to the east.

title: The Hotel Restaurant

description: The southeast corner of the restaurant seems to be mainly a bar section, as the previously unbroken line of tables gives way here.  Bottles line the wall and glasses hang overhead.  The music is slightly louder but does not encumber the conversation of the many guests.  The restaurant continues to the north and west.

exits.description: The restaurant continues to the north.
The restaurant continues to the west.

title: The Hotel Restaurant's Bar

description: As you enter the hotel's central mailing facility, a very shallow room greets you with low ceilings.  The unpleasant white light indicates a room that is rarely used for its luxury.  A heavy marble desk blocks access to the parcels and packages behind it.

exits.description: The busy foyer is back east.

title: The Post Office

description: You are in a small, undecorated room just off of the main foyer.  There rare a couple of small, styled benches here where people occasionally sit while they wait for items to arrive.  The foyer is to the west.

exits.description: The busy foyer is back west.

title: The Donation Room
